content: The `Integer` class wraps the primitive type `int` in an object. The `Integer` class contains a variety of methods for converting `int` values or dealing with the `int` type in general.
fields: [{"name":"MAX_VALUE","type":"static final int","description":"a constant that holds the maximum value that an `int` can have"},{"name":"MIN_VALUE","type":"static final int ","description":"a constant that holds the minimum value that an `int` can have"}]
name: Integer

methods.name: Integer
methods.content: Creates an `Integer` object that represents the specified `int` value.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"value","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the value to be represented by the `Integer` object"}]

methods.name: intValue
methods.content: Returns the value of the `Integer` object as an `int`.

methods.name: parseInt
